.bandcamp.com	TRUE	/	TRUE	...

sonos.title: Sonos
sonos.description: Discover and play music on Sonos speakers
sonos.discoveryHelp: Sonos devices will be automatically discovered on your local network. Make sure your Sonos speakers are connected to the same network as this server.

ProviderCardActions.sonosRequirement1: Sonos speakers must be on the same local network
ProviderCardActions.sonosRequirement2: UPnP/SSDP must be enabled on your network
ProviderCardActions.sonosRequirement3: Server must have network discovery permissions
